Container.Name: ULDAS
Container.Overview:
ULDAS (Unified Language Detection and Subtitle Processing) automatically detects and tags audio/subtitle languages in your media files using Whisper AI. It can also analyze subtitles for forced/SDH detection.
Features: - Automatic audio language detection using Whisper AI - Subtitle language detection and analysis - Forced subtitle detection - SDH (Subtitles for Deaf/Hard of Hearing) detection - MKV remuxing support - Tracking to avoid reprocessing files
Please see the GitHub page for detailed setup instructions and usage guidelines.
